title: Applications and Positions
content:
Learn about our positions and fill out our application form!

Writer

Writers write! They write the wonderful articles that you see on this site and in our monthly issues.

Who are you?

You are enthusiastic to write newspaper style articles.
You enjoy employing your creativity in your writing.
You enjoy comedy.

What do you do?

You write newspaper style articles about issues focussed on the school.
You work with editors to improve your articles.

Editor

Editors edit!

Who are you?

You have a keen eye with grammar.
You enjoy comedy.
You pay attention to the little details.

What do you do?

You help writers and comic artists with their writing.
You make sure our articles are flawless and fact-checked.

Comic artist

Comic artists draw comics! They contribute to the artistic talent of the paper.

Who are you?

You are enthusiastic to design and create comics.
You enjoy creating visuals to communicate ideas effectively.
You enjoy comedy.

What do you do?

You create comics (one to four panels) about issues focussed on the school.
You work with editors to improve your writing and visuals in your comics.

Image editor

Image editors edit images! They create images for each article.

Who are you?

You are enthusiastic to design works supporting articles.
You enjoy creating impactful visuals using existing photographs.

What do you do?

You create images using image editors as associated pictures for articles.
You write captions for your images.
You work with editors to improve your writing and visuals in your work.

Layout Designer

Layout designers design the layout!

Who are you?

You are good with planning out the big picture.
You have an eye for aesthetic.
You are good at organizing things into just the right places.

What do you do?

You help neatly lay out and organize the content of our newspaper.
You gather comics, articles, and illustrations from other team members and compile them effectively.

Social Media Manager

Social media managers manage our social media accounts!

Who are you?

You are experienced with using Instagram and Facebook.
You have an artistic eye as well as a talent to write convincingly.

What do you do?

You create posts for our social media accounts for announcements and updates.
You work with image editors and editors to make sure that the posts are both visually-appealing and well-written.

Website Developer

Website developers develop the website!

Who are you?

You're experienced with static website building, namely HTML and JavaScript. Promises and CSS would be a bonus.

What do you do?

You help maintain the website.
You work with the writers and image editors to make sure all of our articles are posted on the website.
